imdb.plot outline: Musicology is a new, 12-part world music series featuring artists with diverse cultural & musical backgrounds. Each episode features 45 minutes of live performance, integrated with 10-15 minutes of documentary style interviews exploring the rich history of the artists, their music and their heritage.
imdb.title: Musicology: Live from the Old Town School of Folk Music
akas: Musicology: Live from the Old Town School of Folk Music (United States)
plot: Musicology is a new, 12-part world music series featuring artists with diverse cultural & musical backgrounds. Each episode features 45 minutes of live performance, integrated with 10-15 minutes of documentary style interviews exploring the rich history of the artists, their music and their heritage.::Mina Adibpour
